title: Raspberry & Lemon Mini Cupcakes
ingredients: ['Cupcakes', '100g self raising flour', '100g caster sugar', '100g soft butter / marg', '1 egg', '1/2 tsp baking powder', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon', 'raspberries, enough for one per cake or two if making normal sized cupcakes', 'Icing', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon', 'icing sugar']
